articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Infographic: Does Europe have enough gas for winter? - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: With weeks until winter, EU gas storage is almost 90 percent full, a level 15 percent higher than last year.
articles.content:
Russias war in Ukraine has led to a European energy crisis, with the price of natural gas soaring to new highs this year.
As Western nations sparred with Moscow over its invasion, Russia mostly cut … [+5165 chars]

articles.title: Apple may be forced to ditch its lightning charger in Europe - 9News
articles.description: The European Union is one step closer to forcing Apple and other electronics vendors to use a single charging standard for devices such as phones and tablets.

articles.title: EU moves ahead with plans to standardize phone chargers by 2024 - CBC News
articles.description: The European Parliament approved new rules on Tuesday that will introduce a single charging port for mobile phones, tablets and cameras in the EU by 2024, a world first that is expected to affect iPhone maker Apple more than its rivals.
